alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Prowers and north central Baca Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 745 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Two Buttes Reservoir, or 15 miles north of Springfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Prowers and north central Baca Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
